radikalchess.model.checkers

Class MoveChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • radikalchess.model.checkers.MoveChecker

  • public class MoveChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    TThis is a special kind of movement verification (respects the Singleton pattern). Lets you know if a piece can be moved to another position on the board, knowing the rules of the game.
    Author:
    Jose Luis Molina
